caption: A close-up of a young girl with one eye closed, adorned with vibrant eyewear and nail polish, showcasing a blend of modern and traditional aesthetics.

A regal blonde-haired girl, donning a blue armored dress with a white fur trim, wields a golden sword, exuding an aura of royalty and strength. She stands confidently, her gaze directed towards the viewer, with her armored boots and gauntlets adding to her formidable appearance. The artwork is credited to 'kitada mo' and is a depiction of 'artoria pendragon' from the 'fate' series, specifically 'excalibur (fate/stay night)'. The style is 'flat-pasto', and the background is a simple white, emphasizing the character. The overall quality of the artwork is top-notch, showcasing intricate details and a vibrant color palette.
A girl sits contemplatively atop a makeshift room, surrounded by a serene yet haunting ambiance, with a backdrop of a blood-stained window and a rustic refrigerator.
